m_descr:
Use a switch to increment or decrement the value of a dimmable device.
  • Select a switch
  • Define the magnitude of the in-/decrement
  • Select one or more dimmable devices.
GitHub: https://github.com/julra197/z-way-DimmBySwitch
h_magnitudeValue: Integer Value, e.g. 15 or -15 -> positive value: increment, negative value: decrement
h_controller_action: The action is described with a two-digit value: The first digit is the button number, the second digit points to the action of this button (0=short press, 1=release, 2=hold, 3=short press two times, 4 = short press three times, and so on. Examples: Double Click button 2 => 23, Single Click button 1 = 10)
